name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expertwig - Search Web Like An Expert

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will customize your new tab to Expertwig.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a custom chrome tab extension that It provides a custom search bar with results by Microsoft Bing on the new tab page & sets your default search engine to Expertwig Search.
Using this web search engine you will search the web like an expert as our technology is based upon picking the best possible results for your keyword without getting you into much trash content.

Background Photo by Pixabay

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "Expertwig" tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to Microsoft Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://expertwig.com/info/TOS and Privacy Policy at https://expertwig.com/info/privacy
